page.title: 02GODMERSHAM FAMILY LIFE
page.content: The village consists of small households with a high proportion of retired people, some living completely alone. The working population is small and there are few families with children. Modern appliances have reduced the time spent on routine housecare but the resulting leisure time is mainly spent at home. Although most time is spent watching television, families do take an active pride in decorating and furnishing their homes and tending their flourishing gardens. Many families keep domestic pets. Women still knit, sew, embroider with skill and still cook traditional recipes, especially for family celebrations such as Christmas. The mobile library is well used and most families read daily newspapers
